short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UQFinder allows you to not just browse but to explore freely, while it assumes the role of a smart eidetic memory for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UQ finder makes your Uniqreate Experience Data Aggregation to be more efficient. It helps you manage bookmarks in a more intuitive manner and also provides a level of smart support by recording your browsing activity to be able to find important information easily.
